# MPLS Vegan

> Minneapolis vegan restaurant directory and food guide. Comprehensive listings of vegan and vegan-friendly restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and food trucks across the Twin Cities metro area.

## About
MPLS Vegan is the most complete guide to plant-based dining in Minneapolis and Saint Paul, Minnesota. We cover full restaurant listings with menus, hours, and reviews.

## Top Pages

- [Homepage](https://mplsvegan.com/)
- [All Restaurants](https://mplsvegan.com/restaurants)
- [Best Vegan Date Night Restaurants](https://mplsvegan.com/blog/best-vegan-date-night-restaurants-minneapolis)
- [Best Vegan Ice Cream in Minneapolis](https://mplsvegan.com/blog/best-vegan-ice-cream-minneapolis)
- [Best Vegan Pizza in Minneapolis](https://mplsvegan.com/blog/best-vegan-pizza-minneapolis)
- [Best Vegan Mac and Cheese Brands](https://mplsvegan.com/blog/best-vegan-mac-and-cheese-brands-ranked)

## Categories
- Restaurants with full vegan menus
- Vegan-friendly restaurants with plant-based options
- Vegan bakeries and dessert shops
- Food trucks and pop-ups
- Grocery stores with vegan selections

## Location
Minneapolis-Saint Paul, Minnesota, USA
